This is to inform all students seeking admission into York University that the online application form is open for the 2024 academic session. How to apply for admission to York University is given below;

How to Check Application Status:

YORK UNIVERSITY

The information below provides the admission requirement and some courses for students who wish to study at York University. Find Programs of Studies, Admission Requirements as well as how to apply.

French Studies / Études franchises – BA

General Requirements for French Studies / Études franchises:

  • Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)

ENG4U or FRA4U

  • And five additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
  • 4U French

To gain admission to this program, your academic average should be in the mid-to-high 70s.

OUAC code YGF

Liberal Arts & Professional Studies

Eligibility for French Studies / Études franchises

  1. Go to https://futurestudents.yorku.ca/requirements/apply
  2. Check minimum admission requirements
  3. Meet program-specific requirements
  4. Know the application deadlines
  5. Submit your application
  6. Submit all required documentation
  7. Consider a modified admission request (for students with a diagnosed disability or extenuating circumstances that may have affected academic performance)
  8. Check on Transfer Credit for Advanced Placement

How to Apply for Admission to York University in French Studies / Études franchises

  • Go to https://form.apps06.yorku.ca/uaform/
  • Fill the Application form with correct details
  • Submit
  • Application fee cost $130, payable by Visa, Visa Debit, or MasterCard (non-refundable)

You can also Apply through Ontario University Application Centre

  1. Goto https://www.ouac.on.ca/
  2. Select Application Type:

Undergrad (101) – Current Ontario High School Students
Undergrad (105) – International or Canadian Applicant not currently attending an Ontario High School
Law- Ontario Law School Application Service (OLSAS)
REHAB Sciences – Ontario Rehabilitation Sciences Programs Application Service (ORPAS)
Teacher ED – Teacher Education Application Service (TEAS)
Medicine – Ontario Medical School Application Service (OMSAS)

See Also>>>Public Health Admission Requirements In Waterloo University

How to Pay for University Admission for French Studies / Études franchises through  Ontario University Application

Method 1: 101 Application fees ($150)

Method 2: 105 Application fees ( $156)

To pay for the Ontario University Application form,

  • Gotohttps://futurestudents.yorku.ca/requirements/apply
  • Then click the Application method of your choice as applicable to your program of studies to view the requirement

How to Check Application Status:

  • Use your York Reference Number to check your application Status (Reference Number is obtained from an email sent from York University after submitting the application successfully.
  • Visit: https://futurestudents.yorku.ca/requirements/docs-required
  • Upload the required document and check your status.

You can also>>>>>Aberdeen University Scholarship For Masters Degree, Application Process
